main event: Several unidentified flying objects were sighted over San Antonio, Texas on March 25, 1953.
interesting points: The objects were observed by an Air Force officer and his wife, who reported they were moving at a very high speed and occasionally changed course to circle the city.
One of the objects passed through the halo of the moon and left a trail resembling a vapor trail, but it did not persist.
The most unusual aspects were the tremendous speed and complete lack of sound from the objects.
A radar station made contact with the objects, establishing the possibility of accurate observation.
The objects were reported to the Project Blue Book control tower, who confirmed they had also observed similar sightings.
sighted object: several bright lights flying in the sky
witnesses: Air Force officer and his wife
